home.title: Find your perfect
home.subtitle: Explore thousands of boats for sale, identify any vessel from a photo, and discover your dream boat with AI-powered search.

features.subtitle: Discover boats, identify vessels, and find your perfect match

explore.title: Explore Marketplace

snap.title: Snap-to-ID

ai.title: AI Assistant
ai.description: Chat with our AI to get personalized boat recommendations based on your preferences.

ctaSection.title: Ready to find your boat?
ctaSection.subtitle: Start exploring the marketplace or use Snap-to-ID to identify any boat from a photo.

snap.title: Snap-to-ID
snap.subtitle: Upload a photo of any boat to instantly identify its make, model, and specifications.

picker.title: Upload a boat photo
picker.hint: Drag and drop or click to browse
picker.mobileHint: Tap to take a photo with your camera

errors.invalidType: Please select an image file (JPG, PNG, WebP)
errors.tooLarge: Image size must be less than 10MB

preview.tip: Make sure the boat is clearly visible for best results.
preview.privacyNote: Your photo is processed securely and won't be stored.

processing.title: Analyzing your photo...
processing.subtitle: Our AI is identifying the boat. This may take a few seconds.

results.title: Match found!
results.subtitle: Here's what we identified from your photo.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.subtitle: We couldn't process your image. Please try again.

step1.title: Upload a photo
step1.description: Take a picture or upload from your gallery

step2.title: AI analyzes the image
step2.description: Our AI scans the boat and matches it to our database

step3.title: Get instant results
step3.description: View matches with confidence scores and specifications

tips.title: Tips for best results
tips.lighting: Ensure good lighting and avoid harsh shadows
tips.profile: Capture the full side profile of the boat if possible
tips.blur: Avoid blurry images for more accurate results
tips.resolution: Higher resolution photos provide better accuracy

privacy.title: Your privacy matters
privacy.description: Images are processed securely and not stored after analysis.

safety.title: Safety Tips
safety.description: Always inspect the boat in person before making a purchase. Verify all documentation and consider a marine survey.

wizard.subtitle: List your boat for sale or charter

location.subtitle: This helps buyers find your listing.

photos.title: Add photos of your boat
photos.subtitle: High-quality photos help your listing stand out.
photos.formats: JPG, PNG or WebP · Max 10MB each

pricing.title: Set your price
pricing.subtitle: Choose how you want to sell your boat.

summary.title: Review your listing

success.title: Listing created!
success.subtitle: Your boat listing has been created successfully. It will be visible to buyers shortly.
